name: Distract The Cat
description:
Distract the cat to delay the inevitable!

Use Spacebar/Left Mouse Click to Control your laser and guide it towards the highlighted mirror so as to distract the cat before she can give you some cleaning work! Keep an eye on that Distraction Meter!

Enjoy this small trial against time :3

This game has been made for Ludum Dare 50 - Compo (48 hours)

Any feedback is much appreciated!
